issue.title: IHMC Java real time permission problems

content.raw:
Just want to say that I solved this issue.
It turns out that remote logging in to the computer using Google Chrome Remote Desktop in linux does not give enough permissions for ROS/Gazebo/IHMC Java to be used properly. I think it's because the remote desktop goes to the tty20 port. Somehow the lower level NVIDIA drivers are not exposed.

Please mark the issue resolved.
content.html:
Just want to say that I solved this issue. It turns out that remote logging in to the computer using Google Chrome Remote Desktop in linux does not give enough permissions for ROS/Gazebo/IHMC Java to be used properly. I think it's because the remote desktop goes to the tty20 port. Somehow the lower level NVIDIA drivers are not exposed.

Please mark the issue resolved.
